title: Your chance to suggest a new NHS screening programme

content.text: Do you have an idea for a new national screening programme that will do more good than harm to public health, at a reasonable cost? If yes, then the UK National Screening Committee (UK NSC) is welcoming your ideas. The 6th annual call for new screening ‘topics’ (conditions) is now open.

The UK NSC blog provides up to date news from the UK National Screening Committee. You can register to receive updates direct to your inbox, so there’s no need to keep checking for new articles. If you have any questions about this blog article, or about the work of the UK NSC, please contact the UK NSC helpdesk.
